Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: ~JonathanLevi I'm going to go ahead and propose a change which removes your github ID. When you want to add it back, feel free.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Hey ~JonathanLevi can you go ahead and submit the CR changing your github ID? For posterity it will be much more clear that the change has your consent if you originate it.

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: Sure thing. Will do it tomorrow (Tel-Aviv time), thanks.

Action.author: ryjones
Action.body: ~denyeart ~jyellick could we either fix this, or remove ~JonathanLevi and re-add him later?

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: ~ryjones sure. I will actually use "hacera-jonathan" on GitHub. It had the other history. I can push it myself rn. Sorry I dropped this.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: ~JonathanLevi Just a friendly reminder for the month. :)
